title: This is War [Person of Interest Season 4 Trailer]
author: TheHiddenMemory
comment:
@Ren Li  
I know what you mean. I've been in the video editing community for a long time and I can't believe how non-existent the POI video editing community is. Really wish we could get some more talented vid editors editing POI. Anyway, thanks for your compliment. Glad there are some people enjoying my POI vids.
I absolutely LOVE ALL your video's and this is no exception. This should be the official trailer for this season of POI. Excellent work!
Loved this tribute!  The music was perfect, so were the scenes. I miss this show and re-watch it now and then. Thanks!!
Ah, this is greeaaat! I'm going to show this to some of my friends to get them to watch, it's awesome!
description:
"Something has changed. Something fundamental."

**USE HEADPHONES IF POSSIBLE**

I made a season 4 trailer of sorts. 

***SPOILERS FOR SEASON 4 (obviously).***
